messages.title: COALITION OF CHAOS
messages.content: DON’T RISK YOUR VOTE PUTTING ED MILIBAND INTO NO. 10 PROPPED UP BY OTHER PARTIES

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign to scrap the 'Misguided Busway'', an expensive white elephant with no public support. Campaign to scrap the HS2 spur through Lowton, but reopen Kenyon Jct to reconnect Leigh to the NR network.
Campaign for the regeneration of Leigh town centre, starting by slashing parking charges.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Ed Miliband, Nicola Sturgeon, Nigel Farage
mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for UKIP will hand keys of No. 10 to Miliband, poll finds

issues.economy: LA/SNP SPENDING UP = MORE DEBT = HIGHER TAXES = JOBS LOST. BRITAIN CAN’T AFFORD IT, AND YOU’LL HAVE TO PAY FOR IT

quotes.text: Bosses queue up to warn: Miliband will bankrupt Britain
Sturgeon names price for saving Ed
Vince Cable: Lib Dems could enter rainbow coalition with Labour and SNP
Voting for UKIP will hand keys of No. 10 to Miliband, poll finds

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by James Nelson Grundy, on behalf of Louisa Townson, both of Leigh Conservatives, 2 Stave Leigh, Lowton Warrington WA3 1BT. Printed by Stu Print, 49 Globe Road, Skelmersdale, Lancashire, WN8 9LP.
